name: Diane Luquiser
goal:
European Affairs, Communication strategy, programme/project management and business development:
- All sectors with specific high level expertise in Aerospace, Security, External relations,Justice, Home Affairs, ICTS, Energy, Transport and Environment, including their R&I and International cooperation sides;
- Setting up, developing and implementing projects;
- R&I funds, Structural funds, EFD;
- Intelligence gathering for customers;
- Organising key events;
- Organising meetings with key EU representatives;
- Supporting public and private entities to better position on the EU market.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Space policy (ex.Copernicus, Galileo, Space situational awareness, space debris, space and security);
- Security/Homme affairs (ex. fight against terrorism, visa and immigration, Infrastructures protection, digital security, Frontex issues);
- ICTs (ex. Safer internet, 5G, Broadband and digital divide, IPs, Satcoms);
- Fundamental rights (ex. remembrance, anti islamophobia, anti semitism, gender issues);
- Justice (ex. training for judicial staffs on hate crime and hate speeches, internet tracks)
- Environment(ex. CCS, Energy package);
- Transport (ex. Intermodal issues, ATM).
